item.title: Certainty in Kidney Exchange
item.description:
This paper was prepared Fall 2024 for ECON 605: Advanced Microeconomics with Dr. Charles Becker. See the latest draft below.

item.title: Great Salt Lake Policy Dashboard
item.description: The Great Salt Lake is drying up. Why should we care, and what can we do about it?
